chatbot.title: MWAP Assistant
chatbot.subtitle: Explore benefits and schemes for migrant workers across India
chatbot.welcome: Hello! I'm your MWAP assistant. Please select a category below to explore benefits and schemes for migrant workers, or ask me any specific questions.
chatbot.welcomeUser: Welcome back, {name}! Please select a benefit category below to explore schemes for migrant workers, or ask me any specific questions.
chatbot.messagePlaceholder: Type your message or question about benefits...
home.title: Migrant Worker Assistance Platform
home.subtitle: Supporting migrant workers across India with essential services, information, and assistance
home.feature1.title: Easy Registration
home.feature1.description: Simple registration process with secure verification for migrant workers
home.feature2.title: Verified Profiles
home.feature2.description: Secure identity verification with Aadhaar and mobile OTP
home.feature3.title: Government Schemes
home.feature3.description: Access to national and state-specific welfare schemes for migrant workers
home.feature4.title: AI Assistance
home.feature4.description: Intelligent chatbot to answer your questions about available schemes
home.cta.title: Ready to Get Started?
home.cta.description: Join thousands of migrant workers across India who have already benefited from our platform. Register today and access all services.
